features: 【USB C & A CHARGING PORTS & AC OUTLET(Not for iPhone 15 Series)】This touch control nightstand lamp is very practical with dual USB charging ports (5V/2.1A) CURRENTLY NOT COMPATIBLE WITH iPhone 15 Series, and one AC outlet (937W Max.), which enables the power strips to charge your tablets, smart phones, laptop or other devices simultaneously at a full speed whether the lamp is on or off, efficiently saving your time and energy. Perfect for nightstand, office desk, guestroom, etc.

【CONVENIENT 3 LEVEL DIMMABLE TOUCH CONTROL FUNCTION】This touch control bedside lamp provides 3-way adjustable brightness-Low, Medium, High. Easily tap on anywhere of the metal lamp base or the pole to choose the lighting setting as you need. Low mode is perfect for night light; Medium mode is ideal for daily use; High mode is great for reading or working. It can bring a warm and cozy touch to your house, making your home much more welcoming, and impress your guests.

【UNIQUE PHONE STANDS DESIGN FOR KEEPING SPACE NEAT】The table lamp is designed with 3 decorative beads on the lamp base, they can hold your cellphone, iPad, Kindle when charging, suitable for different thickness of your devices. Not only reduce your space but also keep your desktop neat. The base is made of high-quality metal, can prevent to rust and easy to clean. The ladder-shaped design of the lamp pole shows a sense of elegance and the stable structure can avoid wobbling.

【A DIMMABLE EYE-CARING 6W E26 LED BULB INCLUDED】This dimmable LED light bulb contains long led filament with clear glass shade, warm white, noflicker, no strobe, no glaring, no humming, provides so comfortable light and take care all your family’s eyesight. It uses 90% less energy than 60 Watt Incandescent Bulb, and saves 90% money of your electricity fees, perfectly save your time in searching a compatible light bulb.

【MULTI-FUNCTIONAL & MODERN DESIGN FOR GREAT GIFTS】Combined with a cream fabric lampshade to soften brightness and a quality metal base to touch control, this stylish and compact touch lamp is great as a bedside lamp, reading lamp, office lamp; also can be a perfect gift for your friends or your family. This table lamp has 12 months quality caring period. If you have any question during use it, please contact us, we will reply and assist you in 12 hours.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Briever Multifunctional Touch Control USB Table Lamp With the concept of combining touch control, dimmable, USB ports, power outlet, and phone stands all in one lamp, this functional table lamp is so convenient to charge your electric devices at the same time. As we all know that the more technology or devices in the house, the more outlet space we’re struggling to find. This USB desk lamp is to help ease the uses of multiple power strips in your room. You will get great benefit from it when using it.

3-Way Dimmable Touch Control Function Beautiful Modern Desk Lamp With Dimmable LED Bulb This contemporary 3 way dimmable lamp comes with a free dimmable led bulb and linen fabric shade which will be a great functional addition for your nightstand, end table, dinning table, coffee table, sofa side table, dresser, bookshelf, or office desk. The ambient light will create warm and comfortable atmosphere to your for bedroom, guest room, living room, nursery room, college dorm.

Convenient To Charge Your Electric Devices This table lamp is designed with dual USB charging ports (5V/2.1A) and one AC outlet (937W Max.). No need to bend over to find a charger anymore. You can charge your laptop, smartphone, tablet, watch, speaker, etc. fast simultaneously whether the lamp is on or off.

More Convenient: Charging While Sleeping or Using This touch control bedside lamp provides 3-way adjustable brightness-Low, Medium, High. Easily tap on anywhere of the metal lamp base or the pole to choose the lighting setting as you need. Low mode is perfect for night light. You could turn off the light when you sleep. It does not affect the charging of the phone.
Multi-functional & Modern Design For Decor or Gifts Bedside Lamp for Bedroom End table Lamp for Living room Desk Lamp for Home Office Unique Gifts for Festival

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Convenient device charging capabilities.
reviews.reviewText: The Briever USBC touch lamp is a fantastic addition to my workspace. Its sleek design and touch controls make it both functional and stylish. The USB-C compatibility is convenient, eliminating the need for an extra adapter and the receptacle is convenient as well. The adjustable brightness levels cater to various needs, and the color temperature options enhance the overall ambiance but my fav feature is the 2 slots on its base that devices can set ain while being charged. A reliable and aesthetically pleasing touch lamp that complements any modern setup.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very aesthetically pleasing.
reviews.reviewText: Ships fast. Easy to assemble. Perfect size for small decorative space. We have it on a kitchen island. Works as it should. Love the different lighting options.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 16, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lamp, but bulb didn’t last, tricky to replace
reviews.reviewText: My friend loves this lamp! It’s cute, and she doesn’t have to strain to reach the switch since it’s touch activated. It’s ideal for mobility limited people, especially.However the bulb burned out in less than five months, and it was hard to get the right replacement. It requires DIMMABLE bulbs; first I ordered non-dimmable by mistake, and that didn’t work well; after a few days, the bulb randomly would stop working, only to randomly come back on again. I learned, if the bulb goes from dim to bright, then back to dim before going off, it’s not dimmable; it’s three way, and won’t work right.The seller sent me a link to a bulb listing that SAID dimmable, but when I received them, they were also non-dimmable (not lamp seller’s fault). Hopefully my third bulb order will actually be dimmable, and work right!Don’t trust any dimmable bulb listing under $9.95, that’s the cheapest I’ve found!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Looks beauriful. It's very small and cheaply made but still decent for the price.
reviews.reviewText: Lamps look stylish and great. They are (not surprisingly) very light and cheaply made. This isn't really a huge issue as it's just a lamp, and for the price it's fine. Touch works ok. I wish it only had only one brightness level and that they skipped the useless USB feature. Three brightness levels aren't really very useful and I would prefer a single tap on/off. The USB port isn't high power and won't really work on modern devices. The 120V plug works fine and I wish they just skipped the USB port.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Simple AP Touch Lamp
reviews.reviewText: Excellent response to touch. The black can be universally used. Nice soft lighting. When you're half asleep or awake, it's so easy to reach to touch it. The two charging ports and plug make it the perfect inexpensive universal lamp.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’d been using little bedside lamp that had been around since I was a kid because the wiring was getting wonky. I’m perfectly capable of repairing it, but after adding up the cost of a new plug, wire and a new shade I decided to look at a new lamp.The price on this was very reasonable. When it arrived I was happy at how sturdy it was and how the base is nicely weighted to avoid tipping. It looks nice even with my more traditional style furnishings.I really love having the touch activated switch late at night. Me only complaint is a minor one: the lighting levels are in my experience closer to 40, 95, 100%.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 4, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for nightstand
reviews.reviewText: This lamp is a great size with enough light for the bedroom nightstand. I like turning it on and off by touch. It's dimable and they supplied the bulb. It works great. I charge multiple phones using the unique charging stand.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Comes complete with bulb and easy to assemble. Touch dimmer works well and the plug in feature for charging my phone works perfectly. I'd buy it again.

My poor husband fell out of bed one night (he's OK now!) and in doing so, knocked over a glass-shaded lamp. There was glass all over the carpet and I worried that he'd cut himself (he didn't), but I wasn't taking any chances so I searched and searched for a kind of bed-side lamp that wouldn't leave shards of glass on a carpet and found this lamp (comes in three colours) with its sleek shade, touch-light in 3-ways and includes a USB port and socket for normal use. I bought two, one for me too, and we are both very happy with this purchase. Delivered in record time, well-packaged and easy to assemble. The price was very attractive too! Santa came early it seems...

Bought two table lamps for our bedroom. They are stylish and light up the room well. There are 3 brightness levels albeit the 3rd one is just a bit brighter than the 2nd level; hence, you may not think it has 3 levels. I like the touch control anywhere on the lamp base. It came with light bulb and was ready to use immediately. I would highly recommend this lamp.

reviews.reviewTitle: Nice lamp, one setting doesn't work
reviews.reviewText: Happy with this lakp. Works for our small living room table with a nice amount of l8ght. The charge ports work well and it looks nice. Only thing is that the 2nd and 3rd brightness settings are off, one doesn't seem to work or 'wigs out'. Wasn't a huge concern for us for our use, assume it is a one off. The other lamp I purchased at same time is a little different in desgin but relatively the same and oesn't have this issue.
These are great little lamps! Perfect in the bedroom, love the dimming option and the usb plugs!
I bought this for a bedside table lamp. It is stylish, a good size for bedside table and I love that I can charge my gadgets and that it is touch controlled.
